fullplot: In Japan, when the volunteer social assistant Rika Nishina is assigned to visit a family, she is cursed and chased by two revengeful fiends: Kayako, a woman brutally murdered by her husband and her son Toshio. Each person that lives in or visits the haunted house is murdered or disappears.
plot: A mysterious and vengeful spirit marks and pursues anybody who dares enter the house in which it resides.
title: Ju-on: The Grudge
